category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEAllowDragDropWithinContext
preference.preference_description: Defines the behavior of the drag-and-drop of BOM Lines within context for BOP stuctures in the Manufacturing applications. Valid Values: *0: the drag-and-drop of BOM Lines within context is allowed. This is the default value. *1: the drag-and-drop of BOM Lines within context is blocked.
